author: cms-met
body:
Following the discussion of https://indico.cern.ch/event/446476/, the jet pT threshold in type1 MET is raised from 10 to 15 GeV.

Packages modified :
- JetMETCorrections/Type1MET
- PhysicsTools/PatUtils

Expected changes in performances :
All MET variables will be impacted in a quite minimal way. Preliminary studies shows that changes are indeed here, but minimal on DY/QCD/ttbar and W+jets events.
title: Change the type1 jet pt threshold from 10 to 15 GeV
